description: Key questions that must be answered before this behavior can proceed
questions: What test files exist that need production code?
What is the target file or module name and location for the production code?
What are the main classes, functions, or modules that need to be implemented?
What are the key domain objects or data structures involved?
What design patterns or architectural styles should be followed?
Are there any existing code patterns or conventions to follow?
What are the integration points with existing code or external systems?
